projects.title: SoliLMS
projects.description: SoliLMS is a learning management system for our center, and my task was to create an HR management system.

projects.title: GAVE&GOT
projects.description: GAVE&GOT is a website directed to Arabs residing in the Netherlands in order to facilitate the process of buying and selling items among themselves, as well as publishing publications to search for housing for rent or job opportunities.

projects.title: Currency Exchanger
projects.description: Currency Exchanger is small project that exchange currencies depending on API
